basics.name: Fetra Rasolonjatovo
basics.label: Web developer
basics.summary: I have been working as a PHP web developer for several years, gaining extensive experience in web development. Recently, I have been working on projects using Python and JavaScript for about two years. My expertise encompasses the development cycle from developing responsive web applications to deploying them. I am committed to ensuring the best user experience across various devices. I am seeking a Python/React developer position.

work.name: Paositra Malagasy
work.summary: Paositra Malagasy is the national postal service of Madagascar. It is responsible for providing postal services and delivery of mail and packages within the country and to international destinations.
highlights: Developed responsive web applications using technologies related to Php, JavaScript org Python, ensuring user experience across devices.
Worked on front and backend development to maintain application functionality.
Designed and developed the database structure and schema using modeling techniques.
Collaborated with designers to implement UI designs and improve frontend aesthetics.
Deployed applications to both testing and production environments, ensuring seamless transitions from development to production.
Assisted developers in coding development tasks.
